00024         protected static $watched = array();

00032         public static $elementClasses = array(
00033                 'header' => 'debug-header',
00034                 'table' => 'debug-table',
00035                 'tableHeading' => 'debug-table-heading',
00036                 'tableRowEven' => 'debug-table-row-even',
00037                 'tableRowOdd' => 'debug-table-row-odd',

00039                 'traceRowEven' => 'debug-trace-row-even',

00051         public static function watch($key, &$var) {
00052                 
00053                 if(!isset(self::$watched[$key])) self::$watched[$key] = array();
00054                 self::$watched[$key]['ref'] =& $var;
00055                 
00056         }
00057         
00065         public static function watchValue($key, $bookmark = '') {
00066                 
00067                 if(is_object($key)) return clone self::$watched[$key]['ref'];
00068                 else return self::$watched[$key]['ref'];
00069                 
00070         }
00071         
00081         public static function bookmark($key, $bookmark) {
00082                 
00083                 if(!isset(self::$watched[$key]['bookmarks'])) self::$watched[$key]['bookmarks'] = array();
00084                 self::$watched[$key]['bookmarks'][$bookmark] = self::watchValue($key);
00085                 
00086         }
00087         
00096         public static function bookmarkValue($key, $bookmark) {
00097                 
00098                 if(is_object(self::$watched[$key]['bookmarks'][$bookmark])) return clone self::$watched[$key]['bookmarks'][$bookmark];
00099                 else return self::$watched[$key]['bookmarks'][$bookmark];
00100                 
00101         }
00102         
00111         public static function table($data, $return) {
00112                 
00113                 $output = '<table class="' . self::$elementClasses['table'] . '">';
00114                 $output .= '<tr class="' . self::$elementClasses['tableHeading'] . '"><th>Key</th><th>Value</th></tr>';
00115                 foreach($data as $key => $value) {
00116                         if(isset($type) and $type == 'Even') $type = 'Odd';
00117                         else $type = 'Even';
00118                         
00119                         ob_start();
00120                         var_dump($value);
00121                         $dump = ob_get_clean();
00122                         
00123                         $output .= '<tr class="' . self::$elementClasses["tableRow$type"] . "\"><td>$key</td><td><pre>$dump</pre></td></tr>";
00124                 }
00125                 $output .= '</table>';
00126                 
00127                 if($return) return $output;
00128                 else echo $output;
00129                 
00130         }
00131         
00138         public static function watchTable($return = false) {
00139                 
00140                 $output = '<h2 class="' . self::$elementClasses['header'] . '">Watched Variables.</h2>';
00141                 $array = array();
00142                 foreach(self::$watched as $key => &$value) {
00143                         $array[$key] = $value['ref'];
00144                 }
00145                 $output .= self::table($array, true);
00146                 
00147                 if($return) return $output;
00148                 else echo $output;
00149                 
00150         }
00151         
00160         public static function bookmarkTable($key, $return = false) {
00161                 
00162                 $output ='<h2 class="' . self::$elementClasses['header'] . "\">Bookmarks ($key)</h2>";
00163                 $output .= self::table(self::$watched[$key]['bookmarks'], true);
00164                 
00165                 if($return) return $output;
00166                 else echo $output;
00167

00177         public static function backtrace($return = false) {
00178                 
00179                 $output = '';
00180                 $backtrace = debug_backtrace(false);
00181                 $i = count($backtrace);
00182                 foreach($backtrace as $trace) {
00183                         @$output .= '<span class="' . self::$elementClasses['traceRow' . ($i % 2 == 0 ? 'Even' : 'Odd')] . '">' . "$i: {$trace['class']}{$trace['type']}{$trace['function']}() <i>{$trace['file']} line {$trace['line']}</i></span>\n";
00184                         $i -= 1;
00185                 }
00186                 
00187                 if($return) return $output;
00188                 else echo $output;
00189                 
00190         }
00191         
00201         public static function dump($value) {
00202                 
00203                 $output = "\n<pre class=\"" . self::$elementClasses['dump'] . "\">\n<h2 class=\"" . self::$elementClasses['header'] . "\">Debug Output</h2>\n";
00204                 ob_start();
00205                 var_dump($value);
00206                 $output .= ob_get_clean();
00207                 $output .= Debug::backtrace(true);
00208                 
00209                 echo $output;
00210
